infobox.Japanese title:: 第3の指紋殺人事件  (Daisan no Shimon Satsujin Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Juzo Megure  Kamen Yaiba
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Hidekatsu Shibata as Inspector Teraoka  Seiko Fujiki as Misako Teraoka  Wataru Takagi as Kamen Yaiba, Next Conan's Hint

sections.People:
- 40 years old
- Chief Police Inspector of Department 4
- Kogoro's former superior
- Teraoka's wife
- Housewife
- Victim (gunshot)
- Gang leader
- Victim (blunt trauma)
- Gambler shot by Matsuyama
sections.Anime:
- The names of the characters in the Funimation Dub are:
- Teraoka - Tompson Edwards
- Misako Teraoki - Mira Edwards
- Matsuyama - Moreese Cortezini
- The Funimation Dub changes the cirumstances of Teraoka/Edwards' cooperation with the crook. The new version had him accepting money to pay for a badly ill daughter's medical treatments.
- Tompson and Mira's daughter in the dub is named Bree Edwards.
sections.Trivia: - Inspector Teraoka's car is a 1990-1993 Dark Blue Porsche 911 Carrera [964]. The license plate number is 新宿 33, て 84-62 (Shinjuku 33, Te 84-62).
